turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order some coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, where would you like to get your coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 1205 N Hudson St Hoboken, NJ

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would love a venti iced coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any flavoring in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there sugar free caramel?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, but there is sugar free vanilla.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. I'll have 2 pumps of that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are there any dairy free options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, Coconut, or Soy

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have soy, just a splash though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. So that's a venti iced coffee with 2 pumps of sugar free vanilla and a splash of soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You can use my account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. Your coffee is ordered and the receipt will go to your phone.
